Location:
- Exterior; side panel of outdoor HVAC condensing unit

Observations:
- Metal cabinet with gray painted finish
- Manufacturer safety/operating label present and legible (R‑410A noted)
- Light scuffs and small surface discoloration on panel
- Dry vegetation in contact with cabinet at left side

Potential Issues:
- Minor surface rust spots on cabinet finish
- Vegetation/debris contact with unit; may impede airflow and invite pests

Recommendations:
- Clear vegetation/debris around unit; maintain 12–24 in. clearance on all sides
- Clean affected areas; treat surface rust and repaint to prevent corrosion progression
- Continue routine service/maintenance per manufacturer
